assignment4

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment4.Entry
      • assignment4.Book

  • public class Book
extends Entry
    This class contains or inherits all of the methods and variables associated with Books. This class is a subclass of the Entry Class
    See Also:
    Entry

      • Book

        public Book()
        A no-argument constructor

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String title,
    java.lang.String author,
    java.lang.String type,
    Date releaseDate,
    int price)
     throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
            java.lang.Exception
        A constructor for use with previously divided data. It exists in case the future implementations of MetaSearch divides the data for us.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the book
        author - The author of the book
        type - The type of book (eg. paperback)
        releaseDate - The date (or approximate date) that the book was released
        price - The price of the book in dollars
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the Date object passed in was null
        java.lang.Exception - If the title, author, type, releaseDate or price are not within the restrictions of the Book class

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String userInput)
     throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
            java.lang.Exception
        A constructor for use with an unaltered (undivided) string of userInput (one entire record)
        Parameters:
        userInput - The user's input from the keyboard (a record of a book in its entirety)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the day or year of the date is not an integer
        java.lang.Exception - If the title, author, type, releaseDate or price are not within the restrictions of the Book class

        public Book(java.lang.String[] userInput)
     throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
            java.lang.Exception
        A constructor for use with tokenized record input
        Parameters:
        userInput - The user's input, previously tokenized by ; and :
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the day or year of the date is not an integer
        java.lang.Exception - If the title, author, type, releaseDate or price are not within the restrictions of the Book class

        public static boolean validateBook(java.lang.String userInput)
        Checks to see if the record that the user input adheres to the restrictions of the Book class
        Parameters:
        userInput - A String that contains all the information needed to create one record of the Book class
        Returns:
        true if the record meets all of the requirements of the Book class, false otherwise

        type - The type of book
        releaseDate - The date that the book was released
        price - The price of the book in cents
